name: Max Treitler's Fesenjan (Chicken With Pomegranate and Walnut Sauce)
keywords: chicken, pomegranate syrup, walnut, main course, summer
recipeIngredient: 1-pound organic chicken (or duck), boned and skinned by your butcher and cut into 10 pieces, or 2 pounds boneless, skinless chicken thighs

recipeInstructions.text: If using a whole bird, set wings aside for another use. Trim all excess fat from remaining chicken pieces. Toss poultry with salt. In a large, dark pot with a tightly fitting dark lid, combine poultry with remaining ingredients and bake in solar oven until poultry is cooked through, 1 1/2 to 2 1/2 hours, checking after 1 hour and then every 20 minutes or so.
